reviews.review: What do you like best about CS2?Working with Joy, Nina, Claire, Charlie, and Alison has been a fantastic experience—they've provided invaluable insights and hands-on support that have already made a significant impact. We're confident in our upcoming launch and excited about the potential for continued collaboration beyond it.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?So far, we are extremely satisfied with CS2!Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?We engaged CS2 to help us update, streamline, and optimize our funnel while enabling best-in-class tracking. While we have an experienced team in-house, we wanted to bring in CS2’s strategic expertise and deep knowledge to push our discussions and execution further.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?The team that I work with is wonderful. Love working with them.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?Nothing. No compliants at all with working with Cs2.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?I’ve had the pleasure of working with both Christie and Ruben, and I can’t say enough positive things about the experience. Ruben, in particular, has been an absolute joy to collaborate with. He is incredibly patient, kind, and detail-oriented, always ensuring that nothing slips through the cracks. His communication skills are outstanding, making every interaction smooth and productive. Working with CS2 has been such a pleasure - every project has been handled with professionalism and care. Thank you CS2 team!Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?I only get to choose one thing?! Working with Matt, Gany and Allison is fantastic - they are a great team and I enjoy our technical talks working through a problem. Matt has a great way of stepping back and focusing the discussion on what is most important. I love the elegant solutions they come up with! The structure they put in place for our systems is scalable, is easy to use for our users.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?Nothing comes to mind, they do a great job.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.Recommendations to others considering CS2:If you're looking for a team to execute and leave, you'll miss out on CS2's true value. They are great at helping develop a solution based on your strategy and needs and being a part of your team.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?With multiple instances of the same tech after a major merger of multiple companies, we needed to combine tech stacks into one cohesive tech stack that worked for multiple business units. CS2 helped us to work through the transition from strategy to the nuts and bolts of the builds. They're trusted partners, not vendors.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?The best part of working with CS2 is the experience and expertise you get to tap into. Especially in today's market where things are evolving so quickly, it's invaluable to have a partner you can work with on solving new problems and taking advantage of new opportunities.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?None that I can think of, in my experience they've been top class.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.Recommendations to others considering CS2:CS2 offered us the best mix of tool expertise, strategic guidance, and service among all the agencies I interviewed. I would encourage anyone making this kind of decision to do that due diligence about the areas you and your org need the most help in, and the ability of your agency of choice to provide that as well as adapt to new issues in the future.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?CS2 has partnered with me and our team to build out our full GTM structure from the ground up. They've proactively offered solutions to our problems as well as discussed best practices and options in how to solve problems (I appreciate the ability to pivot to multiple types of solutions vs. a specific set way of executing something the same every time). In addition to their technical excellence, they've been super responsive and helpful at all times.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?They are very knowledgeable and in touch with industry best practice. They have hopped on calls last minute to provide expertise that aren't even directly in their area - just to see how they could help. They are easy to communicate/work with, and they help us project manage and see projects through to the end (with results).Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?Nothing, they deliver best-in-class servicesReview collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?We've worked with CS2 for years now and they are truly a part of our team. They have been incredible at leading critical projects, and supporting our internal MOPs team when we need extra set of eyes or help crossing the finish line. They created the lead lifecycle in just a couple months (from idea to execution).  They have worked with us through a complex systems migration that took several months and helped solve every challenge that came our way. They help us on a regular basis to keep the "engine" running smoothly. Everyone needs CS2!Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?We can always rely on Matt and Grant from CS2 to listen to our problems or challenges we run into, provide recommendations, and offer to help get things set up. Their knowledge around Marketo and Salesforce is truly impressive and I've learned so much from them since working together.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?There is not one thing I dislike about CS2.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.Recommendations to others considering CS2:CS2 also has a podcast series as well as YouTube channel where they share their wealth of knowledge with the world. I would recommend checking those out if you are looking for a new agency to work with. We've worked with several of their team members in the past and all of them are great and super knowledgable.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?Some of the larger projects CS2 has helped us with is getting Order of Operations established in Marketo to reduce racing conditions between campaigns by allowing processes to run in a predefined order and creating a Lead Lifecycle. They've also supported us in creating an opt-in process that is GDPR compliant and helped us with scenario testing to ensure everything was working as intended. There are too many projects we've worked on together to list here but if there is a problem to solve or a challenge we run into, we can count on CS2 to provide any support necessary to help us overcome this obstacle.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?I've worked with a few MOps agencies and CS2 provides the best support and they're very action oriented! Their team is top notch and Grant and Matt always make sure they consult the larger CS2 team when problems arise and we need extra advice. I love the meeting recaps that Matt sends to keep us on track.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?Nothing - CS2 is my favorite MOps agency!Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?CS2 has been integral in our system migration. Our team typically has many priorities and CS2 works with us to outline the plan of action every week. Over the last few months of the migration CS2 has talked through risks and migration plans for countless hours, resulting in a smooth transition the risks were minimized with a strategic plan. In my time working with CS2, I've seen them successfully launch Order of Ops in our MAP and close many gaps in our lead and lifecycle processes like reducing fields syncing from CRM to MAP and setting up an automation to auto-recycle lifecycles.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you like best about CS2?Christie and the CS2 team have been a standout in our partnership. Christie, in particular, is incredibly responsive and brings a level of strategic thinking that pushes us to achieve our goals. They don’t just execute on tasks—they take the time to understand the objectives behind each project and offer insightful suggestions that align with our broader vision. The team’s ability to consistently deliver high-quality results, no matter the challenge, is a testament to their dedication and expertise.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about CS2?It’s tough to pinpoint any negatives. CS2 has consistently met our expectations and added substantial value to our operations.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.Recommendations to others considering CS2:Working with CS2 is a no-brainer. Their expertise isn’t just beneficial—it’s a powerful catalyst for growth.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is CS2 solving and how is that benefiting you?CS2 has been instrumental in enhancing our marketing operations and fine-tuning our go-to-market strategies. Their team brings a depth of expertise that would be difficult and costly to build internally. They bridge the gap between external agency support and internal team collaboration, making it feel like we’ve added a highly skilled extension to our own team. This blend of capabilities has helped us overcome challenges in ABM and Target Account Selling, particularly with the integration of next-generation AI-enabled GTM tools.Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.
